scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules output dce-output .spago build dist *.lock .cache
scripts.serve: mkdir -p build/development && cp assets/index.html build/development/index.html && cp index-dev.js build/development/index.js && parcel build/development/index.html --open
scripts.build:production: mkdir -p build/production && cp assets/index.html build/production/index.html && rm -rf dist && spago bundle-app --to build/production/index.js && parcel build build/production/index.html
scripts.bundle:parcel: mkdir -p build/production && cp assets/index.html build/production/index.html && cp index.js build/production/index.js && rm -rf dist && parcel build build/production/index.html --no-source-maps --experimental-scope-hoisting
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:build && npm run bundle:dce && npm run bundle:parcel
